trans-unit.source: To connect to a database created with a previous version of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you must first upgrade that database.

seg-source.mrk: To connect to a database created with a previous version of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you must first upgrade that database.

target.mrk: To connect to a database created with a previous version of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you must first upgrade that database.

trans-unit.source: Upgrading involves writing changes to the system tables, so it is not possible for databases on read-only media. The upgrade process:

seg-source.mrk: Upgrading involves writing changes to the system tables, so it is not possible for databases on read-only media.

target.mrk: Upgrading involves writing changes to the system tables, so it is not possible for databases on read-only media.

trans-unit.source: marks the database as upgraded to the current release (Version <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#vers/shortversionnumber"></ph>).

seg-source.mrk: marks the database as upgraded to the current release (Version <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#vers/shortversionnumber"></ph>).

target.mrk: marks the database as upgraded to the current release (Version <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#vers/shortversionnumber"></ph>).

trans-unit.source: See the release notes for more information on upgrading your databases to this version of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
